alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 11:04AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet and La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...Through 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft
